characterDescription:
Dakhnah is the daughter of one of Dalinar's generals who has acted as a scribe in his war meetings since she was fourteen years old.
According to Veil, at one time Adolin courted her.

characterDetails.Appearance: She is a younger woman with a luscious figure, accentuated by a tight havah. She has dark skin and red lips, clearly brightened with lip paint.
characterDetails.Character: According to Adolin, she loves talking strategy.
